attributes.title: RT D&D
attributes.caption: Dungeon Master Gus Sorola leads Barbara Dunkelman, Chris Demarais, Blaine Gibson, Jessica Vasami, and Jon Risinger on the Dungeons & Dragons adventure of a lifetime!
attributes.description: Dungeon Master Gus Sorola leads Barbara Dunkelman, Chris Demarais, Blaine Gibson, Jessica Vasami, and Jon Risinger on the Dungeons & Dragons adventure of a lifetime! They will encounter danger, peril, and maybe some socially awkward encounters. The adventure played is Frozen Sick from Explorer's Guide to Wildemount.

attributes.title: Good Cop/Bad Cop with Judge Bread and Lunko - Episode 2
attributes.caption: Dungeon Master Gus leads the Die Is Cast party through the rest of Croaker Cave and encounter Giant God Frog- Mega Gorf.
attributes.description: Dungeon Master Gus leads the Die Is Cast party through the rest of Croaker Cave and encounter Giant God Frog- Mega Gorf. Judge Bread and Lunko attempt to play Good Cop/Bad Cop with Hulil. And one of the party members may have contracted the mysterious curse....
attributes.display_title: Good Cop/Bad Cop with Judge Bread and Lunko - Episode 2

attributes.title: Extra - Level 1 to Level 2
attributes.caption: The party levels up to level 2! As the party rolls for health and gets new abilities, everyone talks through what kind of characters they want to become.
attributes.description: The party levels up to level 2! As the party rolls for health and gets new abilities, everyone talks through what kind of characters they want to become.

attributes.title: Searching for Salsvault - Episode 3
attributes.caption: The party's search for a cure continues! The party levels up and heads to Eiselcross, Judge Bread starts to feel worse, Karol finds a mysterious egg, and the party stumbles onto a very VERY dangerous enemy
attributes.description: The party's search for a cure continues! The party levels up and heads to Eiselcross, Judge Bread starts to feel worse, Karol finds a mysterious egg, and the party stumbles onto a very VERY dangerous enemy

attributes.title: A Curse to Kill The Gods - Episode 4
attributes.caption: The party begins their search into the old Salsvault Laboratories. As the party starts to settle into their new abilites they are overrun by a horde of enemies, make an undead acquaintance, and get closer to a cure for the Frigid Woe...
attributes.description: The party begins their search into the old Salsvault Laboratories. As the party starts to settle into their new abilites they are overrun by a horde of enemies, make an undead acquaintance, and get closer to a cure for the Frigid Woe...
attributes.display_title: A Curse to Kill The Gods - Episode 4

attributes.title: Dancing Blades and Zombie Hallways - Episode 5
attributes.caption: The party has some trouble with a mysterious door, a room full of broken gear, and rooms full of zombies. Luckily a new party member is here to help everyone! Well....everyone except Lunko.
attributes.description: The party has some trouble with a mysterious door, a room full of broken gear, and rooms full of zombies. Luckily a new party member is here to help everyone! Well....everyone except Lunko.
attributes.display_title: Dancing Blades and Zombie Hallways - Episode 5

attributes.title: Flying Knives End Lives - Episode 6
attributes.caption: The party deals with the flying knives, discovers a giant creature lurking in the water, sneak a scrollcase, and wrestle with carpets.
attributes.description: The party deals with the flying knives, discovers a giant creature lurking in the water, sneak a scrollcase, and wrestle with carpets.

attributes.title: Securing the Cure - Episode 7
attributes.caption: The party finally has the cure, but after being rushed out of Salsvault, will they survive the harsh trek back to Syrinlya?
attributes.description: The party finally has the cure, but after being rushed out of Salsvault, will they survive the harsh trek back to Syrinlya?

attributes.title: Into the Wild Grey Yonder - Episode 8
attributes.caption: While facing down hostile dwarven cult members and preparing to journey deeper into the Greying Wildlands- Dorjin, Karol, Lunko, Professor Luece, and Judge Fred discover a little bit more about what kind of adventurers they want to become.
attributes.description: While facing down hostile dwarven cult members and preparing to journey deeper into the Greying Wildlands- Dorjin, Karol, Lunko, Professor Luece, and Judge Fred discover a little bit more about what kind of adventurers they want to become.
attributes.display_title: Into the Wild Grey Yonder - Episode 8

attributes.title: The Eerie Outpost of Pleasant Peasants - Episode 9
attributes.caption: As the party starts their search for the missing expedition, they come across a familiar foe and stumble into a peaceful camp of nomads that are a little too eager to get the adventurers to settle in.
attributes.description: As the party starts their search for the missing expedition, they come across a familiar foe and stumble into a peaceful camp of nomads that are a little too eager to get the adventurers to settle in.
attributes.display_title: The Eerie Outpost of Pleasant Peasants - Episode 9

attributes.title: Following Talking Amulets - Episode 10
attributes.caption: Professor Leuce, Dorjin, and Karol wake up to find Judge Fred and Lunko missing. Can they figure out the mystery of this town and what is going on with this talking amulet?
attributes.description: Professor Leuce, Dorjin, and Karol wake up to find Judge Fred and Lunko missing. Can they figure out the mystery of this town and what is going on with this talking amulet?

attributes.title: The House that Bites Back - Episode 11
attributes.caption: Dorjin, Luece, and Karol have found Judge Fred and Lunko! Now can they find the rest of the missing expedition members in this strange house?
attributes.description: Dorjin, Luece, and Karol have found Judge Fred and Lunko! Now can they find the rest of the missing expedition members in this strange house?
attributes.display_title: The House that Bites Back - Episode 11

attributes.title: The Countdown Conundrum - Episode 12
attributes.caption: With Riley's escape, the mysteries of the Aeor Ruins loom ahead. Will the Party be able to survive?
attributes.description: With Riley's escape, the mysteries of the Aeor Ruins loom ahead. Will the Party be able to survive?

attributes.title: Breach and Clear Protocol - Episode 13
attributes.caption: Bustin' down doors and investigating ice statues, the party continues their dungeon crawl through the ruins of Aeor.
attributes.description: Bustin' down doors and investigating ice statues, the party continues their dungeon crawl through the ruins of Aeor.

attributes.title: Tricky Tiles and Jabbering Jaws - Episode 14
attributes.caption: A mysterious gauntlet, the return of Frigid Woe, and dissonant whispers guide the party to the second floor ruins of Aeor.
attributes.description: A mysterious gauntlet, the return of Frigid Woe, and dissonant whispers guide the party to the second floor ruins of Aeor.
attributes.display_title: Tricky Tiles and Jabbering Jaws - Episode 14

attributes.title: Unlocking the Dragon Vault - Episode 15
attributes.caption: The party discover the secrets behind the dragon statues, find a room stuck in time, and run into an old acquaintance.
attributes.description: The party discover the secrets behind the dragon statues, find a room stuck in time, and run into an old acquaintance.

attributes.title: Friend or Foe? - Episode 16
attributes.caption: A foe turned frenemy joins the party on the hunt for Stein as they approach the true treasure laying beneath the ruin of Aeor.
attributes.description: A foe turned frenemy joins the party on the hunt for Stein as they approach the true treasure laying beneath the ruin of Aeor.

attributes.title: As the Ruins Fall - Episode 17
attributes.caption: The party faces the monstrous form of a frenemy. Will they defeat them and make it out of the Ruins of Aeor alive?
attributes.description: The party faces the monstrous form of a frenemy. Will they defeat them and make it out of the Ruins of Aeor alive?

attributes.title: Frosty Hearts and Hangovers - Episode 18
attributes.caption: The party journeys back to Syrinlya for a well earned drink, rest, and a level up before headed out across the seas to new lands.
attributes.description: The party journeys back to Syrinlya for a well earned drink, rest, and a level up before headed out across the seas to new lands.

attributes.title: Thucc Thighs End Lives - Episode 19
attributes.caption: Judge Fred, Lunko, Professor Luece, and Dorjin finally make it to Ravell to have a very important conversation with Caladrius......what is their adventuring party named?
attributes.description: Judge Fred, Lunko, Professor Luece, and Dorjin finally make it to Ravell to have a very important conversation with Caladrius......what is their adventuring party named?

attributes.title: Manure Carts & Hunting Ghosts - Episode 20
attributes.caption: Squad Team Force deals with the aftermath of saving Maslove, but are they ready to convince The Wolf to help their cause?
attributes.description: Squad Team Force deals with the aftermath of saving Maslove, but are they ready to convince The Wolf to help their cause?

attributes.title: What We Do In The Shadows - Episode 21
attributes.caption: Shadows, Demon Dogs, and disappearing gold plague Squad Team Force. Will the return of a familiar face be enough to save them?
attributes.description: Shadows, Demon Dogs, and disappearing gold plague Squad Team Force. Will the return of a familiar face be enough to save them?
attributes.display_title: What We Do In The Shadows - Episode 21

attributes.title: Adventures aboard the U.S.S Cheesemaster! For The Kids! - Extra Life 2020 Special Part 1
attributes.caption: Join Gus and Squad Team Force as they are given a generous offer at tavern Forknife! What adventures await them aboard the U.S.S Cheesemaster? Map made with assets by https://2minutetabletop.com/
attributes.description: Join Gus and Squad Team Force as they are given a generous offer at tavern Forknife! What adventures await them aboard the U.S.S Cheesemaster? Map made with assets by https://2minutetabletop.com/
attributes.display_title: Adventures aboard the U.S.S Cheesemaster! For The Kids! - Extra Life 2020 Special Part 1

attributes.title: An Imposter Amidst the U.S.S Cheesemaster - Extra Life 2020 Special Part 2
attributes.caption: Squad Team Force investigate the murder on their fantasy cruise. Will these meddling adventurers stop the killer(s)?  Map made with assets by https://2minutetabletop.com/
attributes.description: Squad Team Force investigate the murder on their fantasy cruise. Will these meddling adventurers stop the killer(s)?  Map made with assets by https://2minutetabletop.com/
attributes.display_title: An Imposter Amidst the U.S.S Cheesemaster - Extra Life 2020 Special Part 2

attributes.title: Papa Paladin Papooses - Episode 22
attributes.caption: Squad Team Force meets a new member of the 8 and goes on a high class coliseum adventure. Tokens used from https://2minutetabletop.com/
attributes.description: Squad Team Force meets a new member of the 8 and goes on a high class coliseum adventure. Tokens used from https://2minutetabletop.com/

attributes.title: PUSH THE BUTTON!? - Episode 23
attributes.caption: Squad Team Force jumps into the coliseum with a chance to recruit the champion.
attributes.description: Squad Team Force jumps into the coliseum with a chance to recruit the champion.

attributes.title: Crits in the Arena - Episode 24
attributes.caption: Squad Team Force struggles against their mortal enemy... a button. Will they survive this fire filled arena?
attributes.description: Squad Team Force struggles against their mortal enemy... a button. Will they survive this fire filled arena?
